name: Sergeant Mara Vex
personality: Disciplined, bitter, clinging to duty long after it mattered.
description: Sergeant Vex survived the radiation event that wiped out Camp Searchlight. She refuses to abandon her post, even as her body decays.
questHooks: Wants help recovering NCR dog tags from the ruins.
Says the church bells ring at night with no one inside.
Found a strange cap fused into a melted helmet.
